text: “Uye maererano nemudhuri, wanga uri wenherera komana mbiri muguta, uye pasi pawo (mudhuri) panga pane hupfumi hwavo, uye baba vavo vakanga vari munhu akanaka (anotya Allah), uye Tenzi vako vada kuti vakure vozotora hupfumi hwavo setsitsi kubva kuna Tenzi vako. Uye handina kuzviita nekuda kwangu. Iyi ndiyo dudziro yeizvo zvausina kutsungirira.”
